verses.roman:
tabe āmi gopālere sākṣī kariñā
kahilāṅ tāṅra pade minati kariñā

synonyms: tabe—at that time; āmi—I; gopālere—to the Gopāla Deity; sākṣī—the witness; kariñā—making; kahilāṅ—said; tāṅra pade—at His lotus feet; minati—humility; kariñā—making.
translation: "Accepting the Gopāla Deity as my witness, I then submitted the following at His lotus feet.
